      • typeText

        public static void typeText(java.lang.String text)
        Type text at the current cursor position. Requires that a TextField is already active and the keyboard is visible.
        Parameters:
        text - text to type into the field.

      • typeText

        public static void typeText(com.kms.katalon.core.testobject.TestObject field,
                            java.lang.String text,
                            java.lang.Integer timeout)
        Type text in a specific TextField.
        Parameters:
        field - TextField object to receive the text input.
        text - text to type into the field.
        timeout - timeout (in seconds) for TextField-related actions.

      • selectOption

        public static void selectOption(com.kms.katalon.core.testobject.TestObject field,
                                java.lang.String pickerChoice,
                                java.lang.Integer timeout)
                         throws NoSuchPickerChoiceException
        Choose a single value from a drop-down or picker.
        Parameters:
        field - TextField object which will trigger and receive the input from the picker.
        pickerChoice - value of the picker to select.
        timeout - timeout (in seconds) for picker-related actions.
        Throws:
        NoSuchPickerChoiceException - when no matching picker options were found for the requested choice.

      • selectOption

        public static void selectOption(com.kms.katalon.core.testobject.TestObject field,
                                java.lang.String pickerChoice,
                                java.lang.String expectedFieldValue,
                                java.lang.Integer timeout)
                         throws NoSuchPickerChoiceException
        Choose a single value from a drop-down or picker. Use this in cases where the picker value is transformed before showing in the text field.
        Parameters:
        field - TextField object which will trigger and receive the input from the picker.
        pickerChoice - value of the picker to select.
        expectedFieldValue - value used to make sure that the picker choices were made correctly.
        timeout - timeout (in seconds) for picker-related actions.
        Throws:
        NoSuchPickerChoiceException - when no matching picker options were found for the requested choice.

      • selectOption

        public static void selectOption(com.kms.katalon.core.testobject.TestObject field,
                                java.util.List<java.lang.String> pickerChoices,
                                java.lang.String expectedFieldValue,
                                java.lang.Integer timeout)
                         throws NoSuchPickerChoiceException
        Select multiple values from a multipart picker.
        Parameters:
        field - TextField object which will trigger and receive the input from the picker.
        pickerChoices - value of the option to select for each part of the picker.
        expectedFieldValue - value used to make sure that the picker choices were made correctly.
        timeout - timeout (in seconds) for picker-related actions.
        Throws:
        NoSuchPickerChoiceException - when no matching picker options were found for the requested choice.

      • nextField

        public static void nextField()
        Moves the keyboard focus to the next field in the form

        public static void hideKeyboard()
